4315850.name: 白栄大学　0号館
4315850.description:
About This Game

This is an exploration-based horror adventure set in a university.
You play as a member of a paranormal research club, walking through the campus and various haunted locations, taking photographs, gathering information, and compiling articles.

Exploration is not always safe.
In certain areas, you may be chased by unknown entities and forced to run for your life.

A quiet, ordinary university life slowly becomes corrupted by unsettling events.
Even the act of taking photographs can become the trigger for horror.

Key Features

Horror Through Photography

Use a dedicated camera mode to take photos around the university and haunted spots, capturing traces of paranormal phenomena.

Exploration-Focused Gameplay

Freely walk around the campus, gather information, and progress through the story.
Experience the game as if you were truly part of a university club.

Chase and Evasion Horror

In some areas, you must escape from dangerous entities while exploring.
Hiding, keeping your distance, and quick decision-making are key to survival.

Information Gathering Through Conversations and Articles

Talk to students and university staff to collect rumors and testimonies.
Use the gathered information to write articles and advance the story.

Horror That Invades Everyday Life

A psychological horror experience that emphasizes unease and subtle fear, set in the familiar environment of a university.

Recommended For Players Who

  • Enjoy exploration and walking-simulator-style horror games

  • Like games centered around photography

  • Prefer atmosphere and tension over flashy jump scares

  • Are drawn to school settings mixed with paranormal themes
